[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” banner=”true” particles=”true” fullheight=”true” el_class=”mobile-center banner-curb”][vc_column css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-lg-first”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1636385142207{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”]

Shiva Token is The India’s First Bitcoin Reward Token 🇮🇳

Earn Bitcoin while holding $SHIVA Token

10% Bitcoin Re-distribution automatically straight to your wallet. No-Brainer Right?

  • Buy On Pancakeswap
  • Dashboard

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-first”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text el_class=”header-image”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-btoa” el_id=”audit”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]

AUDITED BY AUDIT

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630246350818{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image source=”external_link” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” custom_src=”https://paladinsec.co/pld/assets/audited-by-paladin-standard.svg” link=”https://paladinsec.co/projects/shiva-token/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”783″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.certik.org/projects/shiva-token”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”section-pad section-bg-blend nopb” el_id=”intro”][vc_column width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”res-m-btm”][vc_single_image image=”510″ img_size=”2000×2000″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”order-md-first order-last”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629997727425{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}”]

Why BITCOIN Rewards?

Bitcoin is the beginning of Financial Revelution. A decade ago, 10,000 Bitcoins could buy you a PIZZA. Today 10 Bitcoins can buy you a Luxury Car or a House and in the Next Decade just 1 Bitcoin will make you a Wealthy Person. Hence it’s already considered as the “Digital Gold”. Shiva Token born with the idea of making it’s Holders Financially Independent with this Digital Gold.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”section-pad no-pb section-bg-alt”][vc_column width=”5/12″ css_animation=”none” el_class=”res-m-btm”][vc_single_image image=”538″ img_size=”3000×3000″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]

A Non-Zero Sum Profit Token

Shiva Token is built with a Non-Zero Sum Profit idea where the Investors will be in Profits, Always.

The Memecoins are Rewarding their own coins for holding, which makes you sell them to book your profits and create Red Candles in the Chart. Causing Panic Sell and Monetary Loss to the Investors and Holders.

To prevent this circumstances Shiva Token’s Smart Reward Tokenomics rewarding Bitcoins to it’s Holders by making it a Profitable Asset under every Situation. Shiva Token is made for Diamond Hands (Long Term Investors), where you don’t need to sell your coins to book your profits. Either the Coin jumps to 10x or falls in the Dip, you will be always Rewarded in Bitcoins just for Holding Shiva Token.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-btoa” el_id=”function”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]

Functions of Shiva Token Features

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629990335042{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”]Shiva Token is The Passive Bitcoin Yield Generator on the Binance Smart Chain.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″]

Bitcoin Rewards Redistributed

[vc_column_text]10% of each transaction is distributed amongst all Shiva holders in Bitcoin. If you hold a minimum of 100,000 $SHIVA, you are rewarded with Bitcoin.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_single_image image=”555″ img_size=”large”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”564″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″]

Auto Distribution - 6 Hours

[vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]

Shiva holders get Bitcoin automatically rewarded to their address every 6 hours . No need to claim, no need to request. It just appears in your wallet.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″]

Automatic Liquidty

[vc_column_text]3% of each transaction is automatically injected into the BNB-SHIVA liquidity pool. This is beneficial to all traders of the Shiva token since the increasing liquidity will raise the price floor and make the price more resistant to sudden changes.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_single_image image=”568″ img_size=”large”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”575″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″]

DamruNFT Marketplace

[vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]

DamruNFT will be a Decentralized Community Driven NFT Marketplace to Revolutionize the NFT sector, powered by Shiva token. DamruNFT is born with the aim to Open up the NFT marketplace and Maximize the Earning opportunities to all of the Indie Artists from every corner of the societies across India and the World with Minimal Minting Fees.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″]

T-Swap Decentralized Exchange

[vc_column_text]T-Swap will be India’s First Decentralized Exchange with Bitcoin Reward Mechanism. It is a Decentralized Exchange that is similar to Pancakeswap,  runs on Binance Smart Chain. It will be a decentralized exchange that allows you to trade cryptocurrencies and tokens without a centralized intermediary, keeping custody of your tokens all the while. It is built on automated Smart Contract deployed on Binance Smart Chain, the blockchain platform run by crypto exchange Binance.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_single_image image=”602″ img_size=”large”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”590″ img_size=”2000×2000″ alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″]

Relief Fund Wallet

[vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]

A separate Relief Fund Wallet is being created to fight against Disastrous Humanitarian Crises across the World. Each year Humankind faces several destructive events around the world like various Natural Disasters, Epidemics, Wars etc. Shiva Token is aimed to fight these Real Life calamities by supplying direct Reliefs in the affected areas either through NGOs or Organizations like Binance Charity, UNICEF, National Relief Funds etc.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″]

Weekly Giveaways

[vc_column_text]There will be Exciting Giveaway Contests every week to Reward our Holders. Lucky Winners each week will get Exciting Gifts and Rewards by Promoting, Shilling, Contests etc.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_single_image image=”582″ img_size=”large”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-btoa” el_id=”tokenomics”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]

Tokenomics Tokenomics

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630243912738{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”]Every $SHIVA Token transaction has 18% automatic tax[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”617″ img_size=”3000×3000″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]Every $Shiva Token transaction (purchased or sold) has 18% automatic tax.

$SHIVA TOKEN creates 3 simple function with this transaction tax:

  • 10% Automatic $BTC Redistribution – 10% of every transaction is AUTOMATICALLY redistributed to the holders in $BTC. Auto-Claim $BTC to the Holders Wallet after a 6 hrs reward cycle. (You have to be holding a minimum of 100,000 $SHIVA Tokens)
  • 5% Marketing Tax – The marketing wallet will receive 5% tax from the transactions and also as reflections. Receiving in BNB/bitcoin is better, because when the marketing wallet receives the own project token, it needs to be sold at once to pay for marketing and this makes the price radically fall.
  • 3% Automatic Liquidity Pool – 3% of every transaction contributes toward automatically generating liquidity on PancakeSwap

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-btoa”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]

BUY TAXES TAXES

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630246350818{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

PRICES & RATES PRICES

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630246350818{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

51,000,000 $SHIVA PRIVATE PRE-SALE (/BNB)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

42,500,000 $SHIVA PUBLIC PRE-SALE (/BNB)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

28,000,000 $SHIVA PANCAKESWAP (/BNB)

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-alt” el_id=”distribution”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″]

Token Distribution Token Distribution

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630244595259{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”]Transparency at $SHIVA Token is paramount, especially in the BSC environment, where very few projects emphasize on this principle. We therefore strive to provide confidence for our holders and future investors through an efficient horizontal communication with nothing left to chance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”event-info” width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-6″]
